00034 void imcio_write_dS(const string &file, ub::vector<double> &r, ub::vector<double> &dS, std::list<int> *list)
00035 {
00036     // write the dS
00037     ofstream out_dS;
00038     out_dS.open(file.c_str());
00039     out_dS << setprecision(8);
00040     if (!out_dS)
00041         throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + file);
00042 
00043     if(list == NULL) {
00044         for (size_t i = 0; i < dS.size(); ++i) {
00045             out_dS << r[i] << " " << dS[i] << endl;
00046         }
00047     }
00048     else {
00049         for(std::list<int>::iterator i = list->begin(); i!=list->end(); ++i) {
00050             out_dS << r[*i] << " " << dS[*i] << endl;
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054 
00055     out_dS.close();
00056     cout << "written " << file << endl;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void imcio_write_matrix(const string &file, ub::matrix<double> &gmc, std::list<int> *list)
00060 {
00061     ofstream out_A;
00062     out_A.open(file.c_str());
00063     out_A << setprecision(8);
00064 
00065     if (!out_A)
00066         throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + file);
00067 
00068     if(list == NULL) {
00069         for (group_matrix::size_type i = 0; i < gmc.size1(); ++i) {
00070             for (group_matrix::size_type j = 0; j < gmc.size2(); ++j) {
00071                 out_A << gmc(min(i,j), max(i,j)) << " ";
00072             }
00073             out_A << endl;
00074         }
00075     }
00076     else {
00077         for(std::list<int>::iterator i = list->begin(); i!=list->end(); ++i) {
00078             for(std::list<int>::iterator j = list->begin(); j!=list->end(); ++j) {
00079                 out_A << gmc(*i, *j) << " ";
00080             }
00081             out_A << endl;
00082         }
00083     }
00084 out_A.close();
00085     cout << "written " << file << endl;
00086 }

00088 void imcio_write_index(const string &file, vector<string> &names, vector<RangeParser> &ranges)
00089 {
00090     // write the index
00091 
00092     ofstream out_idx;
00093     out_idx.open(file.c_str());
00094 
00095     if (!out_idx)
00096         throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + file);
00097     
00098     for (size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i)
00099         out_idx << names[i] << " " << ranges[i] << endl;
00100     
00101     out_idx.close();
00102     cout << "written " << file << endl;
00103 }

00105 void imcio_read_dS(const string &filename, ub::vector<double> &r, ub::vector<double> &dS)
00106 {
00107     Table tbl;
00108     tbl.Load(filename);
00109     
00110     r.resize(tbl.size());
00111     dS.resize(tbl.size());
00112     
00113     for(int i=0; i<tbl.size(); ++i) {
00114         r(i) = tbl.x(i);
00115         dS(i) = tbl.y(i);
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 void imcio_read_matrix(const string &filename, ub::matrix<double> &gmc)
00120 {
00121     ifstream in;
00122     in.open(filename.c_str());
00123 
00124     bool is_initialized = false;
00125     if(!in)
00126         throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + filename);
00127 
00128     size_t line_count =0;
00129     string line;
00130     // read till the first data line
00131     while(getline(in, line)) {
00132         // remove comments and xmgrace stuff
00133         line = line.substr(0, line.find("#"));
00134         line = line.substr(0, line.find("@"));
00135 
00136         // tokenize string and put it to vector
00137         Tokenizer tok(line, " \t");
00138         vector<string> tokens;
00139         tok.ToVector(tokens);
00140 
00141         // skip empty lines
00142         if(tokens.size()==0) continue;
00143         if(!is_initialized)
00144             gmc.resize(tokens.size(),tokens.size());
00145         is_initialized=true;
00146 
00147         if(gmc.size1()!=tokens.size())
00148             throw runtime_error(string("error loading ")
00149                     + filename + ": size mismatchm, number of columns differ");
00150         for(size_t i=0; i<tokens.size(); ++i)
00151             gmc(line_count,i) = boost::lexical_cast<double>(tokens[i]);
00152         ++line_count;
00153     }
00154     if(line_count != gmc.size1())
00155             throw runtime_error(string("error loading ")
00156                     + filename + ": size mismatch, not enough lines");
00157     in.close();
00158 }
00159 
00160 void imcio_read_index(const string &filename, vector<string> &names, vector<RangeParser> &ranges)
00161 {
00162     ifstream in;
00163     in.open(filename.c_str());
00164     if(!in)
00165         throw runtime_error(string("error, cannot open file ") + filename);
00166 
00167     names.clear();
00168     ranges.clear();
00169     string line;
00170     
00171     // read till the first data line
00172     while(getline(in, line)) {
00173         // remove comments and xmgrace stuff
00174         line = line.substr(0, line.find("#"));
00175         line = line.substr(0, line.find("@"));
00176 
00177         boost::trim(line);
00178 
00179         size_t found;
00180         found = line.find(" ");
00181         if(found==string::npos)
00182             throw runtime_error(string("wrong format in ") + filename);
00183 
00184         string name = line.substr(0, found);
00185 
00186         string range = line.substr(found);
00187         
00188         RangeParser rp;
00189         rp.Parse(range);
00190         names.push_back(name);
00191         ranges.push_back(rp);
00192 
00193     }
00194     in.close();
00195 }
